## Plot Test

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
set.seed(4343)
x <- rnorm(10)
y <- rnorm(10)
pts <- cbind.data.frame(x,y)
plot_ly(pts, x=~x, y=~y, mode="markers")
```
